word_mean: 指示剂：使用小量，就能以明显的颜色变化或达到一定的pH值而显示某一化学物质的出现或消失的一种物质

entry.def: An indicator is a measurement or value which gives you an idea of what something is like.

example.ex: ...vital economic indicators, such as inflation, growth and the trade gap...
example.tran: 重要的经济指标,例如通货膨胀、增长与贸易逆差

example.ex: The number of wells is a fair indicator of the demand for water.
example.tran: 水井的数量能较准确地反映水需求量的大小。

entry.tran: (汽车上的)转向指示灯，转向灯
entry.def: A car's indicators are the flashing lights that tell you when it is going to turn left or right.

means.word_mean: 1. a number or ratio (a value on a scale of measurement) derived from a series of observed facts; can reveal relative changes as a function of time
3. a device for showing the operating condition of some system

4. (chemistry) a substance that changes color to indicate the presence of some ion or substance; can be used to indicate the completion of a chemical reaction or (in medicine) to test for a particular reaction

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,主要表示"人或物器"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 前辈,前任,[被取代的]原有事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: pre前+de+cess走+or人→前面走过的人→前辈
act行动,行为,扮演+or人或物器→n.男演员,行动者,参与者
aggress侵略,进攻+or人或物器→n.侵略者,攻击者
arbitrate仲裁,公断+or人或物器→n.仲裁人,公断者
auth+or人或物器→n.作家,创造者
collect收集+or人或物器→n.收藏家,征收者
compress挤压+or人或物器→n.压缩机
conquer征服,战胜+or人或物器→n.征服者,胜利者
create创作+or人或物器→n.创造者,创作者
credit贷款+or人或物器→n.债权人
designate指定+or人或物器→n.指示者,指定者

stems_affixes.value_cn: 发现者,侦察器,探测器,检波器,检电器
stems_affixes.word_buile: detect察觉,发觉+or人或物器→n.发现者,侦察器,探测器,检波器,检电器
educate教育+or人或物器→educator教育家
execute执行+or人或物器→n.遗嘱执行人,执行者
gladiate剑状的+or人或物器→n.角斗士,与野兽搏斗者
indicate指示+or人或物器→n.指示器,[化]指示剂
ment精神+or人或物器→n.导师
moderate中等的+or人或物器→n.调解人,仲裁人
oppress压迫,压制+or人或物器→n.压迫者
past+or人或物器→原来是拉丁文"牧羊人"的意思
process过程,处理+or人或物器→n.处理机,处理器
proct监督+or人或物器→n.代理人,学监
project投射出+or人或物器→n.放映机

stems_affixes.value_cn: 海员,水手,不大会晕船的人,船员
stems_affixes.word_buile: sail航行+or人或物器→n.海员,水手,不大会晕船的人,船员

stems_affixes.value_cn: 继承者,接任者,后续的事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: success成功,胜利+or人或物器→继续着别人的成功→继承者,接任者
vend出售+or人或物器→n.小贩

Sentence.sentence: Being funny isn't necessarily an indicator of good social skills and well-being," his research has shown, "it may just exactly be a sign of personality flaws.
It is an indicator of high intelligence
Because healthy savings rates are one of the surest indicators of a country's long-term financial health.
